Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Lock
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Ashland, Cermak, Halsted to Orange Line terminal due to, street blockage near Archer/Lock.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Archer, Ashland, Cermak, Halsted to Orange Line terminal due to, street blockage near Archer/Lock.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Delayed near Pulaski
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing near Pulaski due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing near Pulaski due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.
Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
